body.name: Neutrogena Oil- and Alcohol-Free Facial Toner, Hypoallergenic Skin-Purifying Face Toner to Cleanse, Recondition and Purify Skin, Non-Comedogenic, Quick-Absorbing, 8.5 fl. oz
features: 8.5-fluid ounce of Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Facial Toner to help purify, cleanse and refresh skin without stripping its natural moisture
This alcohol-free face toner is contains mild purifiers that work to gently remove impurities and help recondition skin. Plus it is non-comedogenic so it won't clog pores

The oil-free, hypoallergenic and alcohol-free formula of this gentle toner cleanses and refreshes skin without causing irritation or drying skin and will not strip delicate facial skin of its own natural moisture.Dye free
Moisten cotton ball with Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Toner and apply to face with gentle upward strokes to leave skin feeling fresh and clean without any dryness or stinging
Complete your daily skincare routine with this cleansing face toner for your own at-home self-care experience
body.description: Product Description Help refresh your skin with Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Toner. This refreshing facial toner works to cleanse and tone without stripping skin of its natural moisture. The gentle formula of this oil-free toner contains mild purifiers that work to gently remove impurities and help recondition skin. This cleansing toner is also alcohol-free, hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic and quick absorbing so it won't clog pores as it leaves skin feeling fresh and clean without any dryness or stinging. Complete your daily skincare routine with this cleansing toner for an at-home self-care experience. Brand Story By Neutrogena

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alcohol-Free Toner Works to cleanse and refresh skin without stripping its natural moisture. Mild purifiers in this cleansing toner work to gently remove impurities and help recondition skin. Its alcohol-free so it will not cause irritation. Use toner daily for skin that feels fresh and clean without any dryness or stinging.

Cleanse Cleanse your skin of makeup, dirt and oil. Treat Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Toner can help prep and treat your skin. Moisturize Apply your favorite moisturizer to hydrate and treat your skin. Protect Consider sunscreen, if your moisturizer doesn't contain any, to protect your skin against the damaging effects of the sun, when used with other sun protection measures.

Neutrogena Fresh Foaming Cleanser Neutrogena Alcohol Free Toner Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture for Sensitive Skin Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture with SPF 35 Use for Cleanse Treat Moisture Moisturize, Protect Key Ingredient Glycerin Mild Purifiers, Alcohol-Free Water-based Formula, Glycerin SPF 35 Target Areas Face Face Sensitive Skin, Face Face Scent Scented Scented Fragrance Free Fragrance Free Alcohol Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, apply with a cotton ball.
reviews.reviewText: When I was younger, I used the regular Neutrogena Toner. At that time I had very oily skin, I am now in my eighties and it no longer works for me. My daughter had bought some, but could not use it. She gave it to me, I tried it and loved it, but couldn't find it in the stores near me. She suggested that try Amazon, This is the best toner I have ever used. Prior to using this product, I was using Witch Hazel with rose water, but it still had 2% alcohol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars “No one that shines is gold”
reviews.reviewText: I am really sorry that Johnson and johnson may have sell the rights to another company or decided to cancel the production of this magnificent product. The one that substituted has no “fresh”: odor , comes on less quantity 8 oz vs 8.5 oz. I do not believe that it is J&J the seller. I will not buy this product again. Bring the face lotion fresh smell again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super customer service
reviews.reviewText: I received a broken bottle and the customer service took care off, I highly recommend this product and the company !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Fresh Scent, Moisturizing, Feels so Fresh and SO Great for Its Price. Total Recommend.
reviews.reviewText: Neutrogena's commitment to an oil-free and alcohol-free formula immediately caught my attention, promising a gentle yet effective approach to toning. This toner's promise of cleansing, reconditioning, and purifying the skin was a perfect match for my skincare aspirations. During my usage, I marveled at the visible improvements in my skin's texture and radiance. The toner's rapid absorption meant seamless integration into my regimen, leaving no residue behind.The non-comedogenic nature of the toner is a resounding plus, catering to those seeking pore-friendly solutions. My journey with Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Toner has been nothing short of exceptional. While individual skin responses can vary, I wholeheartedly recommend consulting skincare professionals before incorporating new products.In summary, my experience with Neutrogena Oil- and Alcohol-Free Facial Toner is deserving of a resounding 5-star rating. Its hypoallergenic and skin-purifying properties have exceeded my expectations. To those seeking radiant and revitalized skin, I encourage exploration of this remarkable toner, while considering individual skincare needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, super easy to use, does the job!
reviews.reviewText: Love it! I do not really use make up, only mascara and some cover up. But 90% if my time I wear none. I use moisturizer and night time face mask moisturizers. Thats it. I got this to close my pores, I use Biore daily deep pore cleansing clothes every morning and night and then right after (air dry face first) I use this then moisturizer and then make up if I use any. I have noticed alot less grease and oil on my face. I am a welder and get material on my face alot and this has helped keep my pores clean. When I weld I get REALLY hot and so my face gets hot from the temps and so my pores would open. This helps alot with that. I am also training to be a bus driver for some extra income right now and so I am up early and out late, and this has helped my skin stay consistently good. Not oily and not dry. I just started using this, I believe over a month ago but maybe longer, and have noticed these changes. I am unsure if other toners are better or worse, but for my first ever experience using this, I am overall pleased. I have quite fair skin that gets oily and dryness with chin and nose acne and I am happy with it. It does not make acne go away, it is not a face cleaner, it just helps the pores over time is what I understand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to toner for dry skin.
reviews.reviewText: After I wash my face, I like to make sure every trace of dirt and makeup is gone. I used to use Clinique's toner for sensitive skin but it's pricey and didn't seem to pick up much residue. I have used Neutrogena Alcohol-Free Toner on and off for a long time. It is very gentle and great for dry or sensitive skin. It has a very light scent and doesn't strip my skin. It removes the last traces of dirt and makeup and leaves my skin in a neutral state, ready for my day or night serums and creams.I use a cotton round or square and gently wipe it across my face and neck. I generally see a little residue even though I have washed my face well. My skin doesn't sting or burn and it also isn't dried out like harsher toners do to it. While astringents like SeaBreeze are more powerful, they just aren't for dry, sensitive skin. I shun alcohol in beauty products if I can so this one fits right n with y preferences.It's cheaper than Clinique's toner and does a better job. I like it and think you will too . It doesn't remove a full face of makeup but it isn't made to. It's made to use after cleansing to tone the skin. It's also refreshing in the summer when I am hot and want to freshen up my face quickly. I have a bottle on hand pretty much all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the blue bottle formula
reviews.reviewText: I ordered what I thought was the blue bottle but it came in a clear bottle & was not the same formula as what was in the blue bottle. Left my skin feeling tight.I would send one of the bottles back but it would probably cost too much.
Excelente producto, lo recomiendo para equilibrar el ph de la piel, sigo rutina Coreana con este producto y es perfecto para obrar una limpieza profunda.
Excelente tónico, me encanta, se absorbe rápido en la piel, huele rico, dura bastante. A mi piel le cae muy bien, soy piel mixta Y por el precio es muy recomendable. Lo volvería a comprar

Alcohol free toner tiene perfume, una sorpresa ya que es bastante recomendado para pieles sensibles. Huele como a la colonia de nenuco pero menos intenso.Hidrata y aporta brillo, pero cuidado pieles sensibles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: I should've included this toner in my skin care routine a long time ago!
reviews.reviewText: I've never used a toner in my entire life. This is the first toner that I've ever used. It doesn't dry out my skin. It minimizes my pores. It reduced the oiliness on my T zone significantly. Gives my skin a healthy glow. Smells good and doesn't sting. Awesome product!
